title: Mid-IR Metalens Based on MoS2 Nanopillars
abstract:
This paper proposes a metalens designed to work in 3.3 {\mu}m wavelength
which resides in the mid-IR region. The metasurface was created using MoS2
nanopillars taking advantage of high refractive index and low loss. It could be
used to make compact optical Methane gas sensors.
